title: Material Weather Watch Faces
summary: This's a watch face for Android Wear that tells you the time/weather conditions.
description: Be sure to run the Watch Face configuration during first run of the app after installation!This is a watch face for Android™ Wear, it can also keep you up-to-date with your current weather conditions.  Installation1. Go to Android Wear App - Watch faces - Select and set the watch face - Configuration2. Set on watch and wait a few minutes to get the watch face fully worked.Please enable both GPS(only works outdoors) and the Network Location Provider(works indoors and outdoors) to improve location accuracy.Watch Face Features•	4 different styled Material Design Watch Faces•	Background color and weather icons are changing according to current weather conditions•	Option to detect your current location(shows a default city based on your location)•	Option to select the locations where you want to set weather•	Design for round/square watches•       Use darker color palettes to preserve battery life•	Ability to customize background color•	Choose Weather update interval•	Support 24 and 12 hour format•	Option to display Weather in Fahrenheit or Celsius•       Option to show/hide Unread Count IndicatorWatch Face Configuration•	Go to Android Wear app•	Select watch face in the selection•	After installation, press on the setting icon on top of the watch facePlease note that, you must have an Android Wear device and the Android Wear App(developed by Google) to get watch faces worked.* Android is a trademark of Google Inc.* Weather data from OpenWeatherMap.
descriptionHTML:
Be sure to run the Watch Face configuration during first run of the app after installation!

This is a watch face for Android™ Wear, it can also keep you up-to-date with your current weather conditions.

Installation
1. Go to Android Wear App - Watch faces - Select and set the watch face - Configuration
2. Set on watch and wait a few minutes to get the watch face fully worked.

Please enable both GPS(only works outdoors) and the Network Location Provider(works indoors and outdoors) to improve location accuracy.

Watch Face Features
• 4 different styled Material Design Watch Faces
• Background color and weather icons are changing according to current weather conditions
• Option to detect your current location(shows a default city based on your location)
• Option to select the locations where you want to set weather
• Design for round/square watches
• Use darker color palettes to preserve battery life
• Ability to customize background color
• Choose Weather update interval
• Support 24 and 12 hour format
• Option to display Weather in Fahrenheit or Celsius
• Option to show/hide Unread Count Indicator

Watch Face Configuration
• Go to Android Wear app
• Select watch face in the selection
• After installation, press on the setting icon on top of the watch face

Please note that, you must have an Android Wear device and the Android Wear App(developed by Google) to get watch faces worked.


* Android is a trademark of Google Inc.
* Weather data from OpenWeatherMap.
